Summary: I was driving home with my girlfriend when she pointed out two really bright orange glowing lights really close to each other moving really fast through the sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and i were driving home on the freeway in my area and my girlfriend noticed these two bright orange lights flying super close to each other, closer than any human aircraft ever fly's together. They also were moving at super fast speeds, faster than any aircraft I've seen move. i only saw them for about 8 seconds my girlfriend noticed them a little longer but we both said afterwards how when we first saw them it registered in our brains as something not being right and it seemed so odd and weird. i felt really excited afterwards because i am certain that we saw UFO's.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lehi
There were no other sightings in Lehi on or around April 1st 2013
